alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 02 at 8:11AM CDT until June 03 at 9:46PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Walnut River at Winfield affecting Butler and Cowley Counties. For the Walnut River...including El Dorado, Augusta, Winfield, Arkansas City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Walnut River at Winfield. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Flood waters flow over County Road Cowley 2 west of the city of Rock. Then 4 miles northwest of Winfield, Cowley County Road 18 floods over a section just west of 71st Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 20.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.0 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Walnut River Winfield 18.0 20.6 Thu 8 am CDT 18.6 14.0 11.8 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
